question.text: The white line along the side of the road

explanation.text: A continuous white line is used on many roads to indicate the edge of the carriageway. This can be useful when visibility is restricted. The line is discontinued at junctions, lay-bys and entrances and exits from private drives.

answer.text: shows the edge of the carriageway
shows the approach to a hazard
